codeRegister.title: Register with code
codeRegister.alreadyRegistered: I am already a registered user
codeRegister.description: Here you can register with {{siteName}}. If there are any problems with the registration, please contact the person from whom you received the invitation link.
codeRegister.registering: Your account is about to be created

username.title: Account
username.description: We need your email to send you a confirmation link.

password.title: Set a password
password.description: Please enter a password. Avoid terms that are easy to guess.

terms.title: Terms and privacy
terms.description: Please take time to read the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. To use {{siteName}}, you must agree to both below.

profile.title: Adding a profile image (optional)
profile.description: You can still add a profile image later in your personal settings

failed.title: Registration failed
failed.description: There was an error during registration
